column1: Herblore of the Shire was a book written by Meriadoc Brandybuck
column2: one of several treatises he authored after his return from the War of the Ring.

column1: The book discussed the origins and history of the Hobbits art of smoking Pipe-weed
column2: tracing it back through Tobold Hornblower (who introduced it to the Shire) to its ultimate origins in Middle-earth
column3: in the lands along the southern banks of the Anduin.
